{"id":1559833897,"question_id":3705,"lang":"cpp","lang_name":"C++","time":"8 months, 2 weeks","timestamp":1740883517,"status":10,"status_display":"Accepted","runtime":"17 ms","url":"/submissions/detail/1559833897/","is_pending":"Not Pending","title":"Find the Largest Almost Missing Integer","memory":"32.7 MB","code":"class Solution {\npublic:\n    int largestInteger(vector<int>& nums, int k) {\n        int N = (int)nums.size();\n\n        unordered_map<int, int> m;\n        for (int i=k; i<=N; i++) {\n            int ed = i;\n            int st = i-k;\n            unordered_set<int> s;\n            for (int j=st; j<ed; j++)\n                s.insert(nums[j]);\n            for (int j : s)\n                m[j]++;\n        }\n\n        int ans = -1;\n        for (auto [k, v] : m) \n            if (v == 1)\n                ans = max(ans, k);\n        return ans;\n    }\n};","compare_result":"","title_slug":"find-the-largest-almost-missing-integer","has_notes":false,"flag_type":1,"frontend_id":1036}
